metadata.name: Christmas Time
metadata.description:
This photograph was taken on a cold crisp December night in Brighton, UK. I was about to get a bus home, but as I was on my walk towards the bus shelter I came across this puddle in the middle of the street. I lowered my camera to the puddle and took this photograph, It is one of my favourite photos. I love the symmetry of the lights & the golden festive feel to it.

Photographer - Bradley Moon
